name: inside_cabin
description: You are inside a cabin in the woods.

name: outside_cabin
description: You are outside a small, wooden cabin in the woods. There is a tree here that looks climable!

name: top_of_tree
description: You are at the very top of a tall tree. The branches are very thin here.

name: overgrown_path
description: You are on a overgrown north/south path in the woods. The is what appears to be a deep, dark well here.

name: bottom_of_well
description: You are at the bottom of a very deep, but now dry well. You can just see daylight high overhead.
